job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout GMltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtTheres never been a more exciting time to work for General MotorsltbrgtltbrgtTo achieve our vision of a world with Zero Crashes Zero Emissions and Zero Congestion we need people to join us who are passionate about creating safer better and more sustainable ways for people to get around This bold vision wont happen overnight but just as we transformed how the world moved in the last century we are committed to transforming how we move today and in the futureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy Work for UsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur culture is focused on building inclusive teams where differences and unique perspectives are embraced so you can contribute to your fullest potential as you pursue your career Our locations feature a variety of work environments including open work spaces and virtual connection platforms to inspire productivity and flexible collaboration And we are proud to support our employees volunteer interests and make it a priority to join together in efforts that give back to our communitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout GMltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWere dedicated to achieving our vision of a world with Zero Crashes Zero Emissions and Zero Congestion We are looking for people who are passionate about helping us create safer better and more sustainable solutions for personal mobility Our bold vision wont happen overnight but just as we transformed how the world moved in the last century we are committed to transforming how we move today and in the futureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy Work for Us ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur culture is focused on building inclusive teams where differences and unique perspectives are embraced so you can contribute to your fullest potential as you pursue your career Our locations feature a variety of work environments including open work spaces and virtual connection platforms to inspire productivity and flexible collaboration And we are proud to support our employees volunteer interests and make it a priority to join together in efforts that give back to our communitiesltbrgtltbrgtThis position will work with large sophisticated data sets and apply logic techniques to develop solutions and reporting A successful candidate will be a robust data explorer and an inventive problem solver who is energized by difficult business problemsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilities Includeltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtCreation and implementation of queries compiling and manipulating data from separate sources to form unified sets for analysisltligt ltligtBecome an expert in our data software tools and business processes in order to provide guidance and resolve issuesltligt ltligtQuery development to address standard and adhoc reporting requestsltligt ltligtWork closely with the Information Technologies IT departments to ensure data and tools are accurate and provide feedback on user acceptance testingltligt ltligtBuild Dashboards and custom visualizations to highlight data insightsltligt ltligtCommunication with end users to address questions regarding report data and logicltligt ltligtDocument business rules and processes for consumption by other data scientists and analystsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtBasic RequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtAdditional Job Descriptionltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtBachelors degreeltligt ltligt2 years experience in a technical or quantitative roleltligt ltligt5 years SQL experience Oracle SQL or PL SQLltligt ltligtHigh level of experience with database and data warehousing platforms MS Access SQL Developer Teradata HUE Hive Hadoopltligt ltligtAbility to prepare dashboards and reports using Power BIltligt ltligtFrontend development experience utilizing customized SQL and VB coding to collaborate with Oracle and other databasesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Requirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt2 years experience with Artificial IntelligenceMachine Learning algorithms and techniquesltligt ltligt2 years experience with General Motors vehicle telemetry dataltligt ltligtMasters degree a plusltligt ltligtTime and project management skills used to manage multiple incoming requests for unique reportsltligt ltligtAbility to craft proof of concept systems to support business processesltligt ltligtEffective time management skills to balance workload across multiple simultaneous projects and meet deadlines proactively and independentlyltligt ltligtFlexible analytic approach that allows for producing results at varying levels of precisionltligt ltligtStrong listening and communications skills with ability to clearly and concisely explain sophisticated problems and technologies to nonexpert and executive audiencesltligt ltligtEvidence of being able to transfer solutions to business stakeholders for successful adoption and value realizationltligt ltligtDedication to constant learning to expand skills and keep pace with industry advancesltbrgtltligtltulgtThe policy of General Motors is to extend opportunities to qualified applicants and employees on an equal basis regardless of an individuals age race color sex religion national origin disability sexual orientation gender identityexpression or veteran status Additionally General Motors is committed to being an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers including individuals with disabilities If you need a reasonable accommodation to assist with your job search or application for employment email us at CareersAccommodationsGMcom In your email please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applyingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtBenefits OverviewltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe goal of the General Motors total rewards program is to support the health and wellbeing of you and your family Our comprehensive compensation plan incudes the following benefits in addition to many othersltbrgtltbrgtltligt Paid time off including vacation days holidays and parental leave for mothers fathers and adoptive parentsltligtltligt Healthcare including a triple tax advantaged health savings account and wellness incentive dental vision and life insurance plans to cover you and your familyltligtltligt Company and matching contributions to 401K savings plan to help you save for retirementltligtltligt Global recognition program for peers and leaders to recognize and be recognized for results and behaviors that reflect our company valuesltligtltligt Tuition assistance and student loan refinancingltligtltligt Discount on GM vehicles for you your family and friendsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltstronggtDiversity InformationltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtGeneral Motors is committed to being a workplace that is not only free of discrimination but one that genuinely fosters inclusion and belonging We strongly believe that workforce diversity creates an environment in which our employees can thrive and develop better products for our customers We understand and embrace the variety through which people gain experiences whether through professional personal educational or volunteer opportunitiesGM is proud to be an equal opportunity employerltbrgtltbrgtWe encourage interested candidates to review the key responsibilities and qualifications and apply for any positions that match your skills and capabilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtEqual Employment Opportunity StatementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe policy of General Motors is to extend opportunities to qualified applicants and employees on an equal basis regardless of an individuals age race color sex religion national origin disability sexual orientation gender identityexpression or veteran status Additionally General Motors is committed to being an Equal Employment Opportunity EEO Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers including individuals with disabilities If you need a reasonable accommodation to assist with your job search or application for employment email us atCareersAccommodationsGMcom In your email please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying
